name: Thirsty Mosquito
description:
Yummy! Help the thirsty mosquito in sucking as much blood as possible from her host. The swatter always leaves a juicy mark that gives bonus points. How much can you suck until he gets you? Try it now!

Accomplished during the Animation & Game Jam 2020 by:

Phil - Sound, Game Design

Markus - Programming

Marvin - Art
